title: Experimental learning course for creative applications of sigma notation

context.additional_context: Learners are general citizens interested in creative thinking that connects mathematical symbols with everyday life

learning_goals: Learners will be able to express more than five real-world problem scenarios using sigma notation.
Learners will analyze diverse cases of sigma notation, including non-standard interpretations, and identify logical errors.
Through collaborative projects, learners will develop and present creative problem-solving models applying sigma notation.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
